name: CT Scan
description: Computed tomography (CT) scan is a useful diagnostic tool for detecting diseases and injuries

name: MRI
description: Magnetic resonance imaging (MRI) is a type of scan that uses strong magnetic fields and radio waves to produce detailed images of the inside of the body.

name: Kidney Dialysis
description: Dialysis is a procedure to remove waste products and excess fluid from the blood when the kidneys stop working properly. It often involves diverting blood to a machine to be cleaned.

name: Digital X-ray
description: Digital radiography (DR) is an advanced form of x-ray inspection which produces a digital radiographic image instantly on a computer.

name: Ultrasonography
description: A procedure that uses high-energy sound waves to look at tissues and organs inside the body.

name: Digital MultiChannel ECG
description: Multichannel electrocardiographs record signals from two or more leads simultaneously and are frequently used in place of single-channel units
